channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Kirill Borisov
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Kirill Borisov

item.title: Project 4: Stock Price Web App in Python
item.description: Link to Interactive Website This web app provides an overview and stock price of S&P Top 500 companies. The web app was built in Python using the following libraries: • yfinance • pandas • cufflinks • datetime • streamlit

item.title: Project 3: NBA Players Statistics Data Explorer Web App in Python
item.description: Link to Interactive Website This web app performs webscraping of NBA players statistics data from 1950 - 2019. The web app was built in Python using the following libraries: • base64 • pandas • streamlit https://nba-stats-str.herokuapp.com/ Data source: Basketball-reference.com.

item.title: Project 2: COVID-19 Data Visualization in Tableau Public
item.description: Covid19 is a very sensitive topic so it’s important to be able to see the facts and understand the numbers. That is why I am excited to share with this interactive Data Visualization which explores the numbers of cases and deaths around the world. Please note that it’s not an up to date COVID-19 source. This visualization shows the progression of the virus from January 22, 2020 - April 13, 2020.

item.title: Project 1: Penguin Classification
item.description: Link to Interactive Website This web app predicts the species of penguins as a function of their input parameters (bill length, bill width, flipper length, body mass, sex and island). The web app was built in Python using the following libraries: • streamlit • pandas • numpy • scikit-learn • pickle Link to Interactive Website Link to Github Repository https://penguins-streamlit-app.
